Example.Name: I2C_CfgInit
Example.Description: This example is a simple code segment ,it description how to config the i2c conpemnent ,including enable the i2c clock and slect the pin mode as i2c mode and then init the I2C_InitTypeDef,users can continue add code to this example to complete the i2c funtions . it suit for ht32f125x serial mcus.and can be tested with HT32F125x_Development_Board.
